nodes.text: Marblewood Estate was the home of Black Sun Sector Chief Avrak Villachor. The estate initially served as the home of the Galactic Republic's sector governor before being sold to others. Eventually, it came into the hands of Avrak Villachor. It was located inside a large park that was surrounded by heavy security. The mansion was built in the classical High Empress Teta style and was in the shape of an Aurek.
In 0 ABY, the estate was heavily damaged during a heist.
